sentence: The hostess at the breakfast is angry and half asleep the front desk staff are impolite and not helpful and the concierge staff are just wrong and should not be part of the customer service profession
Mind you other places would provide you a box lunch and you could always bring a couple of beers from the fridge in your room
There were minimal restaurants open each night for dinner and you must make a reservation well in advance to be able to eat there sometimes there was availability at 930PM
There was one truly grumpy bartender at the pool bar who was actually mean Frederick other than him EVERYONE else was WONDERFULNightlife the lobby has a very chic feel not very islandy
The lobby and restaurants were nice but as soon as got of the elevator to go to our room I could not believe how bad in shape it was
There is one large bar and then one smaller one that services the whole lounge area
We walked to the bar to get drinks
Getting drinks at the bar took a long time and the flies at the outside food areas were gross
If you order an appetizer be prepared to have it arrive at the end of the meal
Even the conch fritters and conch salad at the resort were not good compared to local food spots that make these dishes authentically
There are a choice of a la carte restaurants also to choose from

Pros attractive building and restaurants great wifi Shareta BoweCons lousy service unorganized takes FOREVER to do anything eg Be seated at a restaurant order food drinks check in out etc all inclusive is not really all inclusive
After a ten minute berating by my wife to management she miraculously received salmon for her entree
The breakfast area and bar are is filled with flies inside and out
They sat the teens at the hibachi table in their own private room providing them with a 5 course meal
The restaurants are great but breakfast can be really hectic
The food selection and quality was good but the service and organization is terrible
All was excelent the only thing that take off a point is that the schedules restaurant that had supposed to be open until 3 am closed at 1 am
Additionally they serve dinner on the buffet
The only place to eat for breakfast was the buffet
Buffets are average in quality and variety but restaurants were very good
You receive one beer one light beer one Coke one Diet Coke a bag of chips and a granola bar
We also went to Carmine ’s for dinner which was by far the best meal we had all week

The beach very nice a little crowded with wait staff to bring drinks not food so we were forced to act like vagabonds and abscond with plates of food from the outside buffet running from it like thieves in the night
Polside bar is nice noticed earlier in the week it was less staffed stocked but i m assuming that had to do with it being Monday Tuesday
reserve your restaurants you want ahead of time
We had plenty to eat at the breakfast buffet but did not find OGrile very appealing
PLUS as a level guest you get to go to the 4th level lounge and use their concierge to book restaurant nights
Some staff were incredibly friendly other staff mainly in the overcrowded restaurants were too lackadaisical
Tip use the 4th floor bar and visit the Level Lounge to get coffee and drinks
Buffet selection is slim
Some of these restaurants have a Chefs Specials and Signature Drinks section
The water stations available at all the bars still and fizzy water
A few of the restaurants had signature drinks that were not included in our all inclusive package which as a bit frustrating
It probably is not 5star food but every dinner and breakfast we lovely
The pool restaurant again leaves a lot to be desired
The buffet is horrible and if you ’re a vegetarian do n’t even bother staying here no options whatsoever
We were told the buffet was our only option
The pool bar wet bar was always very busy they could use more staff there
Fairly basicNicer restaurants needed to book few days ahead for decent time
